description:
template: fix error checking on execute without parse

Fixed error checking in exec.go to give a sensible error message when
execution is attempted before a successful parse (rather than an
outright panic).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
Disregard this for now - it breaks the tests for some reason. Sorry for the noise.
A couple of tests in exp/template/html were relying on inappropriate panics from Execute - these have been fixed and all tests pass. PTAL.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=4866e8431426 ***

template: fix error checking on execute without parse

Fixed error checking in exec.go to give a sensible error message when
execution is attempted before a successful parse (rather than an
outright panic).
